title: "GPU-Direct Storage hitting the streets to VAST acclaim"
excerpt: "Nvidia’s CPU-bypass GPU-Direct Storage (GDS) technology is now available, and has been added to its HGX AI supercomputer. There are three vendors already in production and five more ramping up.  The HGX is a rack-based system loaded with multiple GPUs to function as a high-end AI acceleration engine."
